ags.managedbean: <managed-bean> <managed-bean-name>ags[COUNTER]</managed-bean-name> <managed-bean-class>com.esri.adf.web.ags.data.AGSLocalMapResource</managed-bean-class> <managed-bean-scope>none</managed-bean-scope> <managed-property> <property-name>user</property-name> <value>#{agsUser[COUNTER]}</value> </managed-property> <managed-property> <property-name>serverObjectName</property-name> <value>[AGS_SERVER_OBJECT_NAME]</value> </managed-property> <managed-property> <property-name>hosts</property-name> <list-entries> <value>[AGS_HOST]</value> </list-entries> </managed-property> <managed-property> <property-name>functionalities</property-name> <map-entries> <map-entry> <key>map</key> <value>#{agsMap}</value> </map-entry> <map-entry> <key>tile</key> <value>#{agsTile}</value> </map-entry> <map-entry> <key>toc</key> <value>#{agsToc}</value> </map-entry> <map-entry> <key>overview</key> <value>#{agsOverview}</value> </map-entry> <map-entry> <key>query</key> <value>#{agsQuery}</value> </map-entry> </map-entries> </managed-property> </managed-bean> <!-- Managed bean for ArcGIS Server resource [END] -->
ags.user: <managed-bean> <managed-bean-name>agsUser[COUNTER]</managed-bean-name> <managed-bean-class>com.esri.adf.web.ags.data.AGSUser</managed-bean-class> <managed-bean-scope>none</managed-bean-scope> <managed-property> <property-name>domain</property-name> <value>[AGS_DOMAIN]</value> </managed-property> <managed-property> <property-name>userName</property-name> <value>[AGS_USER_NAME]</value> </managed-property> <managed-property> <property-name>password</property-name> <value>[AGS_PASSWORD]</value> </managed-property> <managed-property> <property-name>passwordEncrypted</property-name> <value>[AGS_PASSWORD_ENCRYPTED]</value> </managed-property> </managed-bean> <!-- Managed bean for ArcGIS Server user [END] -->

agsext.user: <managed-bean> <managed-bean-name>agsUser[COUNTER]</managed-bean-name> <managed-bean-class>com.esri.adf.web.ags.data.AGSUser</managed-bean-class> <managed-bean-scope>none</managed-bean-scope> <managed-property> <property-name>domain</property-name> <value>[AGS_DOMAIN]</value> </managed-property> <managed-property> <property-name>userName</property-name> <value>[AGS_USER_NAME]</value> </managed-property> <managed-property> <property-name>password</property-name> <value>[AGS_PASSWORD]</value> </managed-property> <managed-property> <property-name>passwordEncrypted</property-name> <value>[AGS_PASSWORD_ENCRYPTED]</value> </managed-property> </managed-bean> <!-- Managed bean for ArcGIS Server user [END] -->

agsws.managedbean: <managed-bean> <managed-bean-name>agsws[COUNTER]</managed-bean-name> <managed-bean-class>com.esri.adf.web.ags.data.AGSMapResource</managed-bean-class> <managed-bean-scope>none</managed-bean-scope> <managed-property> <property-name>endPointURL</property-name> <value>[AGSWS_END_POINT_URL]</value> </managed-property> <managed-property> <property-name>functionalities</property-name> <map-entries> <map-entry> <key>map</key> <value>#{agsMap}</value> </map-entry> <map-entry> <key>tile</key> <value>#{agsTile}</value> </map-entry> <map-entry> <key>overview</key> <value>#{agsOverview}</value> </map-entry> <map-entry> <key>toc</key> <value>#{agsToc}</value> </map-entry> <map-entry> <key>query</key> <value>#{agsQuery}</value> </map-entry> </map-entries> </managed-property> </managed-bean> <!-- Managed bean for ArcGIS Server Web Service resource [END] -->

agswsext.managedbean: <managed-bean> <managed-bean-name>agswsext[COUNTER]</managed-bean-name> <managed-bean-class>com.esri.adf.web.ags.data.AGSExtensionsResource</managed-bean-class> <managed-bean-scope>none</managed-bean-scope> <managed-property> <property-name>endPointURL</property-name> <value>[AGSWS_END_POINT_URL]</value> </managed-property> <managed-property> <property-name>functionalities</property-name> <map-entries> <map-entry> <key>map</key> <value>#{agsMap}</value> </map-entry> <map-entry> <key>tile</key> <value>#{agsTile}</value> </map-entry> <map-entry> <key>overview</key> <value>#{agsOverview}</value> </map-entry> <map-entry> <key>toc</key> <value>#{agsToc}</value> </map-entry> <map-entry> <key>query</key> <value>#{agsQuery}</value> </map-entry> <map-entry> <key>networkAnalyst</key> <value>#{agsNetworkAnalyst}</value> </map-entry> </map-entries> </managed-property> </managed-bean> <!-- Managed bean for ArcGIS Server Web Service resource [END] -->

agsejb.managedbean: <managed-bean> <managed-bean-name>agsejb[COUNTER]</managed-bean-name> <managed-bean-class>com.esri.adf.web.ejb.data.EJBResource</managed-bean-class> <managed-bean-scope>none</managed-bean-scope> <managed-property> <property-name>jndiNames</property-name> <map-entries> <map-entry> <key>map</key> <value>[AGSEJB_MAP_JNDI_NAME]</value> </map-entry> </map-entries> </managed-property> <managed-property> <property-name>jndiConnectionEnvProperties</property-name> <map-entries> <map-entry> <key>java.naming.factory.initial</key> <value>org.jnp.interfaces.NamingContextFactory</value> </map-entry> <!-- AGSEJB APPSERVER SPECIFIC ENTRIES [START] --> <!-- AGSEJB APPSERVER SPECIFIC ENTRIES [END] --> </map-entries> </managed-property> <managed-property> <property-name>functionalities</property-name> <map-entries> <map-entry> <key>map</key> <value>#{ejbMap}</value> </map-entry> <map-entry> <key>overview</key> <value>#{ejbOverview}</value> </map-entry> <map-entry> <key>toc</key> <value>#{ejbToc}</value> </map-entry> <map-entry> <key>query</key> <value>#{ejbQuery}</value> </map-entry> </map-entries> </managed-property> </managed-bean> <!-- Managed bean for ArcGIS Server EJB resource [END] -->

aims.managedbean: <managed-bean> <managed-bean-name>aims[COUNTER]</managed-bean-name> <managed-bean-class>com.esri.adf.web.aims.data.AIMSMapResource</managed-bean-class> <managed-bean-scope>none</managed-bean-scope> <managed-property> <property-name>hostName</property-name> <value>[AIMS_HOST_NAME]</value> </managed-property> <managed-property> <property-name>port</property-name> <value>[AIMS_PORT]</value> </managed-property> <managed-property> <property-name>serviceName</property-name> <value>[AIMS_SERVICE_NAME]</value> </managed-property> <managed-property> <property-name>functionalities</property-name> <!-- Specify only those functionalities which are used by the source --> <map-entries> <map-entry> <key>map</key> <value>#{aimsMap}</value> </map-entry> <map-entry> <key>toc</key> <value>#{aimsToc}</value> </map-entry> <map-entry> <key>overview</key> <value>#{aimsOverview}</value> </map-entry> <map-entry> <key>query</key> <value>#{aimsQuery}</value> </map-entry> </map-entries> </managed-property> </managed-bean> <!-- Managed bean for ArcIMS resource [END] -->

aws.managedbean: <managed-bean> <managed-bean-name>aws[COUNTER]</managed-bean-name> <managed-bean-class>com.esri.adf.web.aws.data.AWSMapResource</managed-bean-class> <managed-bean-scope>none</managed-bean-scope> <managed-property> <property-name>userName</property-name> <value>[USER_NAME]</value> </managed-property> <managed-property> <property-name>password</property-name> <value>[PASSWORD]</value> </managed-property> <managed-property> <property-name>dataSource</property-name> <value>[AWS_DATA_SOURCE]</value> </managed-property> <managed-property> <property-name>functionalities</property-name> <map-entries> <map-entry> <key>map</key> <value>#{awsMap}</value> </map-entry> <map-entry> <key>toc</key> <value>#{awsToc}</value> </map-entry> <map-entry> <key>overview</key> <value>#{awsOverview}</value> </map-entry> </map-entries> </managed-property> </managed-bean> <!-- Managed bean for ArcWeb service resource [END] -->

routing.jsptag: <!-- TASKS --> <a:task mapId="map1" id="routeTask" value="#{routingTask}" taskInfo="#{routingTask.taskInfo}" style="width:305px;height:130px;"/>
